Articles.Content:
When trying to launch a satellite with a M700 survey scanner, the scanner simple teleported outside the fairing, after a little testing and no solution, i came here for help, maybe some of the users that can understand KSP logs, which don't make much sense for me, could give-me a direction on where to look, since i have a lot of mods, and testing one by one is the last resort.

Test Results

Spoiler

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=615590502

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=615590601

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=615591745

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=615591839

Log

Spoiler

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1ig03pdn2lf9w6s/KSP.log?dl=0

 

Edited February 4, 2016 by Neoph
Update Images.

Sorry, I can't see what is going on, can you post a day time picture?

(or maybe my laptop screen is too small to see it properly...)

After taking my time to test all my mods one by one, i found the culprits, a conflict between Kerbal Construction Time and CRP was causing the issue, since i had reinstalled everything yesterday, i was pretty sure they were all up to date, but since CRP comes bundled with several mods, overwrite was a possibility, downloaded a fresh one from GitHub and issue solved, in the end the major issue seems to have been lack of time to thoroughly test it, bit by bit.
